Summary: Starlike UFO seen for several mintues over Murrysville-Plum Borough
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Fireball, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Star-like
divs: Sighting DetailsI'll just paste an email I sent to a buddy of mine.... Ken, something incredible happened last night. I was out walking the dog and as I turned to go in something caught my eye in the sky over the YMCA. I called my Mother out and a neighbor; we stood and watched as a ball of light, best described as looking like a star that was very close, was moving slowly and silently across the sky directly in front of me. There wasn't a noise. Then my Mother called out 'wooo' as it moved up then down very fast. It then started to move the opposite direction on a straight line...still no noise. The brightness just cut off and all that was there was a red glow and poof "gone" ...all of the years I've been looking in the sky and have seen nothing, zilch...I accidentally catch a glimpse of something amazing. I now know what people go through when they're afraid to say anything because my neighbor suggested I call the air force, police or the news and I just couldn't because I didn't want to be a seen as kook...extra-terrestrial? -don't know...unidentified? ...definitely! Murrysville has been a hot spot over the years and I'll attach a YouTube link for you to see. Wow, I feel like my UFO Cherry has been popped. I am now going to invest in my astronomy body braced binoculars and it is now my official hobby. I'm only telling you this story because you're the only I can tell that listens and 'hears' on this subject. Hope you're well, Angelo
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around October 11th 2012
